main event: A silver, large, elliptical object was observed gliding or floating at a constant altitude for twelve minutes on 9 June 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared to have a gradual buildup of speed and then leveled off,The wind conditions at the time suggested that the sighting could be explained by a balloon,The object was seen by four confirmed witnesses,There was a mention of a glowing object that changed positions and disappeared in a 'flash',The document indicates that the sighting could potentially have been caused by an aircraft or astronomical phenomena.
